nodes.text: The moon of Dorumaa was terraformed into a resort moon by the Dorumaa Investment Group. The name of the resort was Dorumaa Resort. It was run by a group of Humans, Twi'leks, and Gungans. They believed in service with a smile and were so cheerful that they were sometimes jokingly called the "Neo-Caarites."

Research by the Dorumaa Investment Group indicated that the optimal supervisor to worker ratio for resorts was one to five. More than that took time away from helping guests. So the Head Manager, Mar Daghreb, had five property managers who reported to her, and they each had five individuals which reported to them.
